author: Megan Williams
title: Italy sits tight under lockdown, as deaths and infections jump and coronavirus spreads south
description: After a glimmer of hope earlier this week that the effects of the quarantine were starting to show, official infections and deaths in Italy rebounded. Nerves are fraying as restrictions get tighter.
content:
This week, a video compilation of frustrated Italian mayors, shaking their fists and berating townspeople flouting lockdown restrictions, went viral.
"Where the hell are you all going with your dogs?!" screamed one, referring to the sudden rise in dog walkin… [+5985 chars]
